title: Proposed IRS Rule Could Penalize Some Heirs of Retirement Accounts
sub_head: The new regulation would affect accounts inherited after 2019
body:
Proposed new regulations from the Internal Revenue Service for inherited retirement accounts would require many heirs to make minimum annual withdrawals from the accountsâ€”leaving less room for the savings to grow tax-deferred over the years.
The new rules would provide guidance to the Secure Act of 2019, which made several changes to laws governing retirement accounts.
